titleInfo.title: Promoting safety and health in a green economy

mods.abstract: The report looks at different "green industries" from an OSH perspective. Industries discussed include all forms of renewable energy, waste management (including shipbreaking), agriculture, forestry, construction, and the special case of nuclear energy.
